name: Thread Rippaz
description:
Play as a little shoe-lace stealing goblin and compete against friends in fast-paced button-mashing gameplay to be the best thief around the tavern. 

- 4 player (Competitive)
- 4 Controllers required
- Local Multiplayer Only

Music - Bjorn Lynne - Kool Klub (Remastered)

Completed with a five-member development team.
